Centrepiece space is a hotspot in the Garden, Portal Chamber, and Formal Garden of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

Contents

  • 1 Garden
    • 1.1 Creation Menu
  • 2 Portal Chamber
    • 2.1 Creation Menu
  • 3 Formal Garden
    • 3.1 Creation Menu

Key[c 1] Level Centrepiece Materials Experience Cost
1 1 Exit portal Iron bar x10 100 1,490
2 5 Decorative rock Limestone brick x5 100 1,150
3 10 Pond Soft clay x10 100 1,640
4 15 Imp statue Limestone brick x5
Soft clay x5 		150 1,970
5 70 Dungeon entrance Marble block 500 332,156
  1. ^ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.

Key[c 1] Level Centrepiece Materials Experience Cost
1 50 Teleport focus Limestone brick x2 40 460
2 65 Greater teleport focus Marble block 500 332,156
3 80 Scrying pool Marble block x4 2,000 1,328,624
  1. ^ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.
